price: (4) And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain [in faith].
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
